factsCheck.conclusion: The text is factually accurate, supported by credible sources.

writingAssistant.conclusion: The writing is clear but lacks proper structure and has grammatical issues.

suggestions.about: This product is the best in the market.
suggestions.value: Avoid using absolute claims; consider supporting with data or softening the statement.
Use more objective language to enhance credibility.

seoSuggestions.conclusion: The text is moderately optimized but lacks effective keyword placement and meta description clarity.

suggestions.about: Boost your health with our product.
suggestions.value: Include long-tail keywords like 'daily immunity boost supplements' for better SEO impact.
Consider integrating keywords that align with user search intent, such as 'immunity routine tips'.

similarContents.title: The Truth About Immunity Boosters

similarContents.title: Best Wellness Products for Daily Use
